meaning_str.bing:
v. 生产；制造；制作；出示
n. 产品；（尤指）农产品
网络. 产生；出产；产物

生产；产生；制造；造出；拍摄（电影、戏剧等）；创作（音乐、艺术作品等）；引起；导致；出示；呈现；提供；使（线段）延长；生长；培养；繁育
农产品；农产物；产品；成果；结果；出品

1.en: All of these uncertainties inherent in risk assessment combine to produce a very wide range of risk estimates in most cases.
1.cn: 风险评估中所固有的这些不确定性问题在大多数案例中导致了差异巨大的风险估价。

2.en: The government has so far failed to combine the twin requirements of force and development to produce a successful strategy.
2.cn: 目前为止，政府还未能提出结合武力镇压和经济发展两者要求的可行策略。

3.en: Just suppose that ten of the thousands of genetically modified vegetables or fruits sold over the next twenty years produce health damage.
3.cn: 只是设想一下，在未来二十年中出售的数以万计的转基因蔬菜或是水果所产生的健康危害。

0.en: This vast quantity of corn makes it possible to produce beef on an industrial scale.
0.cn: 巨量的玉米让这一切成为可能，让我们能够以工业级的规模生产牛肉。

1.en: We no longer see the beauty of life, but only what it can do for our species, what it enables us to produce.
1.cn: 我们再也看不到美好的生命，我们只顾着利用地球，只顾着加快生产。

2.en: Banks then channel the savings into investment in new plants, skills and techniques that let us produce more.
2.cn: 这样银行就能把储蓄的钱转向投资于新工厂、发展新技术以及提高我们的生产效率。

3.en: Fear of foreign competition once led countries to try and produce everything they needed and impose heavy taxes to keep out foreign goods.
3.cn: 对外国竞争感到的恐惧让一些国家决定自给自足，自行生产所有产品，并且向国外的商品收相当重的税。

4.en: In the future, all the manufacturers, they make the machines, the machines can not only produce the products, the machines must talk, the machine must think.
4.cn: 未来的世界，所有的制造商制造什么机器，这些机器不仅会生产产品，它们必须说话，它们必须思考。

5.en: He pointed out that even if a country can produce pretty much everything at the lowest possible cost, with what economists call an absolute advantage, it's still better to focus on the products it can make most efficiently, that sacrifice the least amount of other goods, and let the rest of the world do the same.
5.cn: 他指出即使一个国家能用最低的成本生产所有东西，也就是经济学家所说的拥有「绝对利益」最好的还是专注于最有效率的生产并放弃其他选项，而让其他国家也做相同的事。

6.en: I told you. I told you in the produce aisle. I remember that.
6.cn: 我告诉过你，在买菜的时候，我记得。

7.en: But these power plants produce more of our electricity than any other source.
7.cn: 但是，大部分发电站还是使用同一种能源，也就是最常见的。

8.en: But her cows produce a lot of waste, and she's found a brand-new way to use it.
8.cn: 但她的奶牛就浪费不少了，她找到了一个新方法加以利用。

9.en: Ugly grandchildren. But you're lovely. You're bound to produce little Imbeciles!
9.cn: 我担心的是生个丑孙子，但是你很可爱，你注定要生一个小…蠢货！

10.en: Coal and car pollutants often produce a permanent twilight in Shanghai, Beijing and other cities.
10.cn: 煤炭与汽车尾气污染物常制造出一种永久的暮色，笼罩于上海、北京和其他城市的上空。

11.en: Ted and his fellow California tomato growers produce close to 13 million tons of them every year.
11.cn: 泰德和其他的加州番茄种植者每年能收获将近一千三百万吨番茄。

12.en: Houston. Be advised we're going to deliberately breach the VAL to produce some reverse thrust. What?
12.cn: 休斯顿，我们要故意冲破阀门然后制造一个反向的助推力。你说什么？

13.en: These cows produce an energy resource that you don't have to dig, drill, ship, or pipe in. But a shovel does come in handy.
13.cn: 这些奶牛产生一种无需挖洞，钻孔，装船，输送的能源但要用到铁铲。

14.en: This mammoth markets brawled over one square kilometer. It provides 80% of all the agricultural produce consumed in Beijing.
14.cn: 这个大市场喧嚣鼎沸一平方多公里，它提供了北京消耗的农产品的八成。

15.en: I've known Mrs. Delfino for years. She pays for the grapes she eats in the produce section. She would never do anything bad.
15.cn: 我认识德尔非诺太太很多年了，她在品尝区吃两颗葡萄都要付钱，她绝不可能做什么坏事。

16.en: By the end of their journey, David's bees have travelled 8,500 miles and pollinated an estimated 5,000 acres of America's produce.
16.cn: 大卫的蜜蜂行经8500英里，给超过5000英亩的作物传授花粉。

17.en: And in the process produce a ripple effect that boosts wages for the middle class and spurs economic growth for the United States of America.
17.cn: 并带动连锁反应，不仅提高中产阶级的工资，也将刺激美国经济的增长。

18.en: David's story is disturbing to me. If the bees are in trouble, so are the farmers who depend on them and the consumers who want fresh produce.
18.cn: 大卫的故事对我影响很大，要是蜜蜂正在危险之中,那么那些依赖他们的农民，那些想吃新鲜水果的消费者。

19.en: Some produce is so popular, it has its own street. Guess where we are? Pumpkin street. This is onion Street. And this is Marrow Street. Unsurprisingly.
19.cn: 有些食品深受欢迎，成行成市了。猜猜我们在哪里？南瓜街。这是洋葱街。这个是西葫芦一条街。毫不奇怪。
